author: A D Balasubramaniyan
text:
2,670 striking government employees stage a road roko

Third day of strike:Members of Tamil Nadu Government Employees Association (TNGEA), stage a dharna in front of the Collectorate in Vellore on Friday. -Photo: C. Venkatachalapathy

As many as 2,670 striking government employees staged a road roko and courted arrest in Vellore and Tiruvannamalai districts on Friday.

In Vellore, the employees protested in front of the Collectorate. Nearly 2,000 of them including 1,100 women were arrested. In Tiruvannamalai, the striking employees staged a road roko in front of Anna Statue and 670 of them including 260 women were arrested.

Their demands

Employees belonging to 32 departmental trade unions including those of the noon meal department, revenue, rural development, public health and highway participated in the road roko. They were all released in the evening.

Among other things their demands mainly included giving up of the contributory pension scheme and merger of part of the Dearness Allowance with basic pay and announcement of interim relief before the Seventh Pay Commission recommendations come in.
title: Govt. employees court arrest in Tiruvannamalai, Vellore
